feedback: Image 1 lacks additional content text present in Image 2.
Image 1 has no border radius, while Image 2 has rounded corners (approximately 8px).
Image 1 has no shadow, whereas Image 2 has a subtle shadow effect.
The font weight of the title in Image 1 is normal, while in Image 2 it is bold.
Image 1 has no padding, while Image 2 has padding around the content (approximately 16px).
The background color in Image 1 is pure white (#FFFFFF), while Image 2 has a slightly off-white background (#F9FAFB).
Add additional content text below the title in Image 1.
Apply a border radius of 8px to match Image 2.
Add a shadow effect similar to Image 2.
Change the font weight of the title to bold in Image 1.
Add padding of 16px around the content in Image 1.
Adjust the background color to #F9FAFB in Image 1.
